title: Brown Draped Cotton Embroidered Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a brown draped flowing cotton dress with full sleeves and crew neck, delicate tonal embroidery across bodice and hem, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims
trims_and_details: tonal embroidery on bodice and hem

techpack.care_instructions: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, line dry, warm iron

provenance.inspiration: Earthy tones and artisanal embroidery inspired by desert landscapes
